item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“gokon, post:38, topic:56129”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=79736.msg1600362#msg1600362 date=1184568427]
It’s been dead for five months.
[/quote] you obviously cant count or read. “July” and “July” are the same month. 15-2=13. 13 days is less than half of any month, even february on a non-leap year. plus the first time i bumped it was only a 4 month bump. (june go back 1, thats may. go back 1 more, april. go back 1 more, march. go back 1 more, february. 1+1+1+1=4) and before you get all pissy on me for this post, its only been 14 days. i looked up excommunication and gues what, this aint a religious community motherf**kers![/quote]Contrary. This topic died when RS was updated, thus rendering this useless. It’s been dead since February. You obviously can’t read or count. This is month seven of the year. February is month two. 7 - 2 = 5. Five months. You fail.[quote=“io9, post:39, topic:56129”]^^ Stop trying to be smart.

item.description:
@gokon wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:32, topic:56129”]^^ You don’t run it in Eclipse. Just run the run.bat.

Also, I just realized it was updated on my B-day :P[/quote]
no no no. i used eclipse to make sure ext.java was ok, thats where the 7 errors came in. i explained what happens with run.bat in my previous post.

[quote=“pplsuqbawlz, post:30, topic:56129”][quote author=gokon link=topic=79736.msg1558536#msg1558536 date=1183230868]
(im sorry if this shows up as a double post, i already posted about the errors i talk about in this but from what i can see, my post was deleted.)
according to eclipse SDK there are 7 errors with the Ext.java code. also, how do you run the main program? because run.bat just shows some stuff that it wont let me highlight so i cant copy/paste it into here, and says press any key to continue. trying to run bcel-5.2.jar gives this error message: Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from C:\DOCUME~1\Ian\LOCALS~1\Temp\Rar$DI32.219\bcel-5.2.jar
[/quote]

For bumping this post you deserve to be excommunicated.[/quote] 3 things: #1, dont flame. #2, what does “excommunicated” mean? and #3, this was only a 4 month bump when some people make 8 or 9 month bumps without being flamed.
